cases.note: withkeyword/builtin: mock function returns same result for both rule defs
modules:
package test

mock_concat("one", _) := ["one"]

mock_concat("one", x) := x

numbers := ["one", "one"]

p := s if {
	s := {concat(n, [n]) | some n in numbers} with concat as mock_concat
}

withkeyword/builtin: indirect call, arity 1, replacement is local variable via scan
modules:
package test
p if {
  some v in numbers.range(1, 10)
  q with count as v
}
q if r
r if count("foo") == 10
